channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: LAist、今後2年間で400万～500万ドルの "大幅な予算不足 "に直面し、レイオフを回避するためスタッフの自主的な買い取りプログラムを開始（Christi Carras/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Christi Carras / Los Angeles Times:
LAist initiates a voluntary buyout program for staff to avoid layoffs as it faces a “significant budget shortfall” ranging from $4M-$5M in the next two years  —  Journalists at LAist have been offered buyouts ahead of a potential round of layoffs at the local public radio station …

item.title: AMCネットワークス、第1四半期の純収入は前年同期比17％減の5億9600万ドル、営業利益は同36％減の1億1000万ドル、ストリーミング収入は同3％増の1億4500万ドル、加入者数は1150万人（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
AMC Networks reports Q1 net revenue fell 17% YoY to $596M, operating income fell 36% YoY to $110M, streaming revenue grew 3% YoY to $145M, and 11.5M subscribers  —  The company, led by CEO Kristin Dolan, reported its first-quarter results. … After returning to streaming subscriber growth …

item.title: グーグルのYouTube TVは現在8M以上の加入者を抱えているが、ケーブル加入をやめる消費者が増える中、公共サービスとしてC-SPANをチャンネル・ラインナップに加えるべきだ（Tom Wheeler/The Hill）。
item.description:
Tom Wheeler / The Hill:
Google's YouTube TV, which now has over 8M subscribers, should add C-SPAN to its channel lineup as a public service, as more consumers ditch cable subscriptions  —  C-SPAN celebrated its 45th anniversary this year.  Since 1979, the nonprofit cable network has given Americans a window on their democracy …

item.title: 10年以上にわたってゲームをレビューし、約750万人のYouTube登録者を持つダンキーことジェイソン・ガストロウが、インディーゲームのパブリッシング会社Bigmodeを設立（Zachary Small/New York Times）
item.description:
Zachary Small / New York Times:
Jason Gastrow, aka Dunkey, who has nearly 7.5M YouTube subscribers after reviewing games for over a decade, starts Bigmode, a publishing company for indie games  —  After a decade of humorously reviewing games, the man known as Dunkey began a publishing company to support indie projects, starting with the mazelike Animal Well.

item.title: 英国映画分類委員会、映画の評価方法に関する最新のガイドラインを採択、米国ではガイドライン更新の体系的プロセスは存在しない（Christopher Kuo/New York Times）
item.description:
Christopher Kuo / New York Times:
The British Board of Film Classification adopts updated guidelines for how it rates movies; in the US, no systematic process for updating guidelines exists  —  As the attitudes of moviegoers evolve, so do the guidelines of the ratings board, which has reclassified dozens of films including “Mary Poppins” and “Rocky.”

item.title: オーストラリア連邦政府は、メタ社がニュース販売会社とのコンテンツ購入契約を破棄したことを調査するため、合同議会特別委員会を設置する計画だ。
item.description:
The Australian:
Australia's federal government plans to create a joint parliamentary select committee to investigate Meta abandoning payment-for-content deals with news outlets  —  Picture: NCA NewsWire / Martin Ollman  —  The decision by tech giant Meta to abandon payment-for-content deals with news outlets …

item.title: ネクスター第1四半期：売上高は前年同期比2.1％増の$128B、純利益は同89.8％増の$167M、The CWの損失は$50M削減、2024年の損失削減見込みの約半分（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Nexstar Q1: revenue up 2.1% YoY to $1.28B, net income up 89.8% YoY to $167M, losses for The CW were cut by $50M, or about half 2024's projected loss reductions  —  The CW's losses fell by $50 million in the first quarter and parent Nexstar Media Group still expects the network to turn a profit by next year …

item.title: ElevenLabsが音楽生成AIモデルをプレビューし、テキストプロンプトから生成された歌詞付きの曲のサンプルを示す（Ken Yeung/VentureBeat）
item.description:
Ken Yeung / VentureBeat:
ElevenLabs previews a music-generating AI model, showing samples of songs with lyrics generated from text prompts  —  Voice AI startup ElevenLabs is offering an early look at a new model that turns a prompt into song lyrics.  To raise awareness, it's following a similar playbook Sam Altman used …

item.title: イスラエルはアルジャジーラを安全保障上の脅威と呼び、アルジャジーラはイスラエルがガザでの残虐行為を隠したいのだと言っている。
item.description:
New York Times:
A look at Israel's long-strained history with Al Jazeera, which Israel calls a security threat, while Al Jazeera says Israel wants to hide its brutality in Gaza  —  The network will keep covering the war in Gaza, but it will be harder for Israelis to watch.

item.title: 情報筋シンクレアはミネアポリスやオースティンなどの185テレビ局のうち60局以上の売却を検討しており、テニスチャンネルの選択肢を探っている（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
Sources: Sinclair is looking to sell 60+ of its 185 TV stations, in markets including Minneapolis and Austin, and is exploring options for the Tennis Channel  —  Signage stands outside the Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc. headquarters in Cockeysville, Maryland, U.S., on Friday, Aug. 10, 2018.

item.title: ガネット、26のコミュニティ紙を統括するベテラン編集者を「競合メディア企業」と「独自情報を共有」したとして解雇、その相手はポインターだった（Rick Edmonds/Poynter）
item.description:
Rick Edmonds / Poynter:
Gannett fires an experienced editor overseeing 26 community newspapers for “sharing proprietary information” with a “competing media company”, which was Poynter  —  Sarah Leach spoke to Poynter in an attempt to staff up her team.  She may have been successful, even if she won't be at Gannett to see it through.

item.title: OpenAIのニュースパブリッシャーへのピッチデッキは、チャット会話におけるパートナーへの優先的な配置と、「ディスプレイの成功」を条件とした支払いを約束している（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
OpenAI's pitch deck to news publishers promises priority placement to partners in chat conversations and payment contingent on “display success”  —  OpenAI's Preferred Publisher Program offers media companies licensing deals  —  The generative artificial intelligence firm OpenAI …

item.title: レディット、AIデータライセンシーによる削除された投稿やコメントの使用禁止を含む新コンテンツポリシーを発表、2024年のライセンス収入は6000万ドル以上を見込む（Aisha Counts/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Aisha Counts / Bloomberg:
Reddit releases a new content policy, including a ban on AI data licensees from using deleted posts or comments; Reddit expects $60M+ in 2024 licensing revenue  —  - Social media company restricts data use by AI companies  — Reddit expects to generate $60 million from licensing in 2024

item.title: Ofcomの報告書：英国の放送局は、配信コストの上昇と視聴者のオンライン化に伴い、放送テレビが経済的に成り立たなくなる「転換点」を予測している（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Ofcom report: UK broadcasters predict a “tipping point” when broadcast TV will become economically unviable as distribution costs rise and audiences move online  —  Media watchdog warned of ‘tipping point’ for model's economic viability  —  British broadcasters have warned …

item.title: NPRの偏向」に関する下院公聴会で、共和党はNPRのCEOの不在を批判したが、地方局を賞賛する声もあり、参考人はNPRの地方分権化または資金援助を求めた（Tyler Falk/Current）
item.description:
Tyler Falk / Current:
At a House hearing on “NPR bias”, Republicans criticize NPR CEO's absence but some praise local stations, and witnesses call for decentralizing or defunding NPR  —  House Republicans criticized NPR CEO Katherine Maher Wednesday for not attending a hearing about alleged bias within the network …
